segments.source_content: # i18n - Using git

translations.zh-CN: # 国际化 - 使用 Git

segments.source_content: A **possible translation strategy** is to **version control the translation files** with Git (or any other [VCS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_control)).

translations.zh-CN: 一种**可行的翻译策略**是使用 Git（或任何其他[版本控制系统](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_control)）**对翻译文件进行版本控制**。

segments.source_content: ## Tradeoffs {#tradeoffs}

translations.zh-CN: ## 权衡利弊 {#tradeoffs}

segments.source_content: This strategy has advantages:

translations.zh-CN: 该策略具有以下优势：

segments.source_content:
- **Easy to get started**: just commit the `i18n` folder to Git
- **Easy for developers**: Git, GitHub and pull requests are mainstream developer tools
- **Free** (or without any additional cost, assuming you already use Git)
- **Low friction**: does not require signing up to an external tool
- **Rewarding**: contributors are happy to have a nice contribution history

translations.zh-CN:
- **易于上手**：只需将 `i18n` 文件夹提交到 Git
- **对开发者友好**：Git、GitHub 和拉取请求是主流的开发者工具
- **免费**（或无额外成本，假设您已在使用 Git）
- **低门槛**：无需注册外部工具
- **有成就感**：贡献者会因良好的贡献记录而感到欣喜

segments.source_content: Using Git also present some shortcomings:

translations.zh-CN: 使用 Git 也存在一些不足：

segments.source_content:
- **Hard for non-developers**: they do not master Git and pull-requests
- **Hard for professional translators**: they are used to SaaS translation software and advanced features
- **Hard to maintain**: you have to keep the translated files **in sync** with the untranslated files

translations.zh-CN:
- **对非开发者困难**：他们不精通 Git 和拉取请求
- **对专业翻译人员困难**：他们习惯使用 SaaS 翻译软件和高级功能
- **难以维护**：必须保持翻译文件与未翻译文件**同步**

segments.source_content:
:::note

Some **large-scale technical projects** (React, Vue.js, MDN, TypeScript, Nuxt.js, etc.) use Git for translations.

Refer to the [Docusaurus i18n RFC](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3317) for our notes and links studying these systems.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

一些**大型技术项目**（React、Vue.js、MDN、TypeScript、Nuxt.js 等）使用 Git 进行翻译。

有关我们的研究笔记和相关链接，请参阅 [Docusaurus 国际化 RFC](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3317)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Initialization {#initialization}

translations.zh-CN: ## 初始化 {#initialization}

segments.source_content: This is a walk-through of using Git to translate a newly initialized English Docusaurus website into French, and assume you already followed the [i18n tutorial](./i18n-tutorial.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: 以下是通过 Git 将新初始化的英文 Docusaurus 网站翻译成法文的步骤，假设您已按照[国际化教程](./i18n-tutorial.mdx)操作。

segments.source_content: ### Prepare the Docusaurus site {#prepare-the-docusaurus-site}

translations.zh-CN: ### 准备 Docusaurus 站点 {#prepare-the-docusaurus-site}

segments.source_content: Initialize a new Docusaurus site:

translations.zh-CN: 初始化一个新的 Docusaurus 站点：

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx create-docusaurus@latest website classic
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_026f2f3e

segments.source_content: Add the site configuration for the French language:

translations.zh-CN: 为法语添加站点配置：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_48ec8149

segments.source_content: Translate the homepage:

translations.zh-CN: 翻译首页：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4fb3ded8

segments.source_content: ### Initialize the `i18n` folder {#initialize-the-i18n-folder}

translations.zh-CN: ### 初始化 `i18n` 文件夹 {#initialize-the-i18n-folder}

segments.source_content: Use the [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI command to initialize the JSON translation files for the French locale:

translations.zh-CN: 使用 [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI 命令初始化法语环境的 JSON 翻译文件：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run write-translations -- --locale fr

  1 translations written at i18n/fr/code.json
 11 translations written at i18n/fr/docusaurus-theme-classic/footer.json
  4 translations written at i18n/fr/docusaurus-theme-classic/navbar.json
  3 translations written at i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current.json
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_daa16011

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use the `--messagePrefix '(fr) '` option to make the untranslated strings stand out.

`Hello` will appear as `(fr) Hello` and makes it clear a translation is missing.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用 `--messagePrefix '(fr) '` 选项突出显示未翻译的字符串。

`Hello` 将显示为 `(fr) Hello`，明确表示缺少翻译。

:::

segments.source_content: Copy your untranslated Markdown files to the French folder:

translations.zh-CN: 将未翻译的 Markdown 文件复制到法语文件夹：

segments.source_content:
```bash
mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current
cp -r docs/** i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current

mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog
cp -r blog/** i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog

mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
cp -r src/pages/**.md i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
cp -r src/pages/**.mdx i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
```
Add all these files to Git.

translations.zh-CN: 将所有文件添加到 Git。

segments.source_content: ### Translate the files {#translate-the-files}

translations.zh-CN: ### 翻译文件 {#translate-the-files}

segments.source_content: Translate the Markdown and JSON files in `i18n/fr` and commit the translation.

translations.zh-CN: 翻译 `i18n/fr` 中的 Markdown 和 JSON 文件并提交翻译。

segments.source_content: You should now be able to start your site in French and see the translations:

translations.zh-CN: 您现在应该能够以法语启动站点并查看翻译：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run start -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_18fb666f

segments.source_content: You can also build the site locally or on your CI:

translations.zh-CN: 您还可以在本地或 CI 上构建站点：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run build
# or
npm run build -- --locale fr
```

segments.source_content: ### Repeat {#repeat}

translations.zh-CN: ### 重复操作 {#repeat}

segments.source_content: Follow the same process for each locale you need to support.

translations.zh-CN: 对每个需要支持的语种重复相同流程。

segments.source_content: ## Maintenance {#maintenance}

translations.zh-CN: ## 维护 {#maintenance}

segments.source_content: Keeping translated files **consistent** with the originals **can be challenging**, in particular for Markdown documents.

translations.zh-CN: 保持翻译文件与原始文件**同步可能具有挑战性**，尤其是对于 Markdown 文档。

segments.source_content: ### Markdown translations {#markdown-translations}

translations.zh-CN: ### Markdown 翻译 {#markdown-translations}

segments.source_content: When an untranslated Markdown document is edited, it is **your responsibility to maintain the respective translated files**, and we unfortunately don't have a good way to help you do so.

translations.zh-CN: 当未翻译的 Markdown 文档被编辑时，**您有责任维护相应的翻译文件**，遗憾的是我们目前无法提供有效的协助方案。

segments.source_content: To keep your translated sites consistent, when the `website/docs/doc1.md` doc is edited, you need **backport these edits** to `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/doc1.md`.

translations.zh-CN: 为确保翻译站点的一致性，当 `website/docs/doc1.md` 文档被编辑时，您需要**将这些修改反向移植**到 `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/doc1.md`。

segments.source_content: ### JSON translations {#json-translations}

translations.zh-CN: ### JSON 翻译文件维护 {#json-translations}

segments.source_content: To help you maintain the JSON translation files, it is possible to run again the [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI command:

translations.zh-CN: 为协助维护 JSON 翻译文件，您可以重新运行 [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) CLI 命令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run write-translations -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0029045f

segments.source_content: New translations will be appended, and existing ones will not be overridden.

translations.zh-CN: 新的翻译内容会被追加，现有翻译不会被覆盖。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Reset your translations with the `--override` option.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用 `--override` 选项可重置您的翻译内容。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Localize edit URLs {#localize-edit-urls}

translations.zh-CN: ### 本地化编辑链接 {#localize-edit-urls}

segments.source_content: When the user is browsing a page at `/fr/doc1`, the edit button will link by default to the unlocalized doc at `website/docs/doc1.md`.

translations.zh-CN: 当用户浏览 `/fr/doc1` 页面时，编辑按钮默认会指向未本地化的文档 `website/docs/doc1.md`。

segments.source_content: Your translations are on Git, and you can use the `editLocalizedFiles: true` option of the docs and blog plugins.

translations.zh-CN: 若翻译文件托管在 Git 上，您可以使用文档和博客插件的 `editLocalizedFiles: true` 选项。

segments.source_content: The edit button will link to the localized doc at `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/doc1.md`.

translations.zh-CN: 编辑按钮将指向本地化文档 `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/doc1.md`。
